name: Views_PostRecipientManualReviewView
description: This method returns the URL of the page that allows a sender to [manually review](https://support.docusign.com/en/guides/ndse-user-guide-send-documents-with-id-verification) the ID of a recipient.

accountId.description: A value that identifies your account. This value is automatically generated by DocuSign for any account you create. Copy the value from the API Account ID field in the [AppsI and Keys](https://support.docusign.com/en/guides/ndse-admin-guide-api-and-keys) page.

$ul: **url**: URL to the Review ID page.

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
